Text: if you could get a copy of this season at a decent bitrate and 1080p, like the first season you posted, i would seed until the sun goes out. the first season's files all ended up around the same size, so someone had to of done a nice bluray rip. please!

This was the best I could find

I colleted the episodes from different sources on the internet and put them into one folder :)

yeah i figured youd found them, and thanks for the share. i just hoped someone out there with a BD drive and a copy of the season 2 set would undertake the project. im building a chronological set of the series which i am transcoding to ps3 to one day seed.
